A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is not a good movie\, judged only on its own merits - in order of severity\, it's flaws are sloppy writing\, poor direction\, weak pacing.

Judged as a Star Wars movie\, this is easily one of the worst of the entire franchise. It's nonsensical and completely inconsistent in tone and plot with everything that came become. In the same way that Disney's "Hobbit" movies came a distant\, sloppy second to the outstanding Lord of the Rings Trilogy\, the Last Jedi is an embarrassment to the franchise and a slap in the face for the fans.

Ignore the clueless\, possibly-bought-and-paid-for critical reviews. This is a mediocre movie at best.
